front.title: Use of GOST signature algorithms in DNSKEY and RRSIG Resource Records for DNSSEC

abstract.t: This document describes how to produce signature and hash using GOST (R 34.10-2001, R 34.11-94) algorithms foor DNSKEY, RRSIG and DS resource records for use in the Domain Name System Security Extensions (DNSSEC). V.Dolmatov Expires September 06, 2010 [page 1]
